text: chaur puok anak( anak mean chomnue) kom haw( chhmoh)anakneasar trang nowknongchamnaom puok anak dauchchea kar haw( chhmoh trang )robsa puok anak towvinhtowmk aoy saoh . chea karpit nasa a l laoh doeng champoh puok del luoch kech chenh( pi angkobrachoum robsa anakneasar)knong chamnaom puok anak . dau che neah chaur aoy puok del brachheang nung batobanhchea robsa keat brongobraytn champoh krohasann nung thleak leu puokke ryy tearounakamm yeang chhucheab thleak leu puokke
